verses.roman:
dui śākhāra upaśākhāya tāṅ-sabāra gaṇana
yāṅra gṛhe mahāprabhura sadā saṅkīrtana

synonyms: dui śākhāra—of the two branches; upaśākhāya—on the subbranches; tāṅ-sabāra—of all of them; gaṇana—counting; yāṅra gṛhe—in whose house; mahāprabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sadā—always; saṅkīrtana—congregational chanting.
translation: There is no counting the subbranches of these two branches. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu held congregational chanting daily at the house of Śrīvāsa Paṇḍita.
